statements: SELECT * FROM FashionShowInvitations;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE attending = true;
SELECT guest_name, guest_category FROM FashionShowInvitations ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE guest_category = 'VIP' AND attending = true;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE guest_name LIKE '%son%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE guest_category = 'VIP' AND attending = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowInvitations ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT guest_name, attending FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE guest_category = 'Regular' OR guest_category = 'VIP';
SELECT DISTINCT guest_category FROM FashionShowInvitations;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowInvitations WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%' AND attending = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM GuestList;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name FROM GuestList;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM GuestList WHERE guest_id = 1;
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email, phone_number FROM GuestList ORDER BY guest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Invitation WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM GuestList WHERE guest_name = 'John'
SELECT guest_name, email FROM GuestList WHERE guest_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email ASC
SELECT invitation_id, event_date, event_theme FROM Invitation WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_theme = 'Birthday Party'
SELECT guest_name, email, event_date, event_location FROM GuestList INNER JOIN Invitation ON GuestList.guest_id = Invitation.guest_id
SELECT * FROM GuestList ORDER BY guest_name DESC, email ASC
SELECT * FROM FashionShow;
SELECT event_name, location FROM FashionShow ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, profession FROM Attendee WHERE profession='Designer';
SELECT * FROM Invitation WHERE status='Accepted';
SELECT attendee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_invitations FROM Invitation GROUP BY attendee_id;
SELECT * FROM FashionShow WHERE event_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT event_name, location FROM FashionShow ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, profession FROM Attendee WHERE profession = 'Designer';
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM FashionShow JOIN Invitation ON FashionShow.id = Invitation.fashion_show_id WHERE status = 'Accepted';
SELECT event_name, location FROM FashionShow WHERE id = (SELECT fashion_show_id FROM Invitation WHERE status = 'Pending');
SELECT * FROM FashionShowEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM FashionShowEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM FashionShowEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Guests WHERE guest_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM Guests;
SELECT * FROM FashionShowEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM FashionShowEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM FashionShowEvents WHERE event_location = 'Paris';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_phone FROM Guests;
SELECT guest_name, dietary_restrictions FROM Guests JOIN GuestPreferences ON Guests.guest_id = GuestPreferences.guest_id;
SELECT * FROM Invitation;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM Invitation WHERE event_type = 'Wedding';
SELECT invitation_id, attendee_name FROM Invitation ORDER BY invitation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FashionShow WHERE show_date >= '2022-12-01';
SELECT guest_name, invited_by FROM GuestList ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Invitation WHERE event_type = 'Wedding';
SELECT guest_name, invited_by FROM GuestList WHERE invited_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM FashionShow ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, fashion_style, favorite_designer FROM AttendeePreferences WHERE favorite_designer LIKE '%Dior%';
SELECT i.attendee_name, r.response FROM Invitation i JOIN RSVP r ON i.invitation_id = r.invitation_id WHERE r.response = 'Yes';
